FlavorText: The heavy Genghis Delta machine gun uses sapphire wiring to integrate tactical systems.

Name: Genghis-E1
FlavorText: Echo-1 Genghis variant, built to put rounds through Cabal armor and anything inside.

Name: Hannibal-E
FlavorText: This Echo variant is rigged for destruction through the delivery of sustained heavy fire.

Name: Harrowed Qullim's Terminus
FlavorText: "If only...if only we had heeded the Queen..."

Name: Horologium
FlavorText: A Guardian relic named for the clock of the night sky.

Name: Jolder's Hammer
FlavorText: A machine gun forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

Name: Karst-MG4
FlavorText: Yawning caves. Clinging damp. Hidden alcoves. Stay sharp.

Name: Lacustrine-MG4
FlavorText: Taste of water. Scrape of dirt. Swath of grass. Take aim.

Name: Lunation CSc
FlavorText: How shall we measure the passage of time?

Name: Maria-MG3
FlavorText: The nothingness dispenser.

Name: MG18A Harm's Way
FlavorText: Dark plains. Starry skies. Clear air. Reclaim the range.

Name: Nihilist CSc
FlavorText: How do you make meaning from battle with chaos incarnate?

Name: Objection IV
FlavorText: Executor-issued machine gun for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

Name: Pacifier X
FlavorText: Executor-issued heavy-fire weapon, custom-rigged for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

Name: Painted Artemisia-D
FlavorText: A highly accurate Häkke heavy machine gun, earned through glory in the Crucible.

Name: Phenomena CSm
FlavorText: To the wondering eye, what is not a miracle?

Name: Planetary CSc
FlavorText: What planet will not, one day soon, sing of your deeds?

Name: Prestige IV
FlavorText: Executor-issued machine gun for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

Name: Qua Brecan I
FlavorText: The science of savagery lies in the smallest of weaknesses.

Name: Qua Roris I
FlavorText: Some minds are a palace. Others, a prison. A Warlock's is both.

Name: Qullim's Terminus
FlavorText: "If only...if only we had heeded the Queen..."

Name: Red River Mk. 40
FlavorText: It'll live up to its name, just as long as the target actually bleeds something red.

Name: Rift Valley-MG3
FlavorText: Wound in the earth. Long vectors. Clean shots. Our dream, and yours.

Name: Ruin Wake
FlavorText: Before you, only victory. Behind you, only conquest.

Name: Sargon-A
FlavorText: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Sargon-A Team Support Weapon is an all-purpose death machine.

Name: Sargon-B
FlavorText: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Sargon B-series delivers an improved fluorocarbon cooling system.

Name: Sargon-B1
FlavorText: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Sargon-B1 Team Support Weapon is an answer to Fallen shock tactics.

Name: Sargon-B2
FlavorText: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Sargon-B2 is a general-purpose weapon noted for its pleasant ergonomics.

Name: Sargon-C
FlavorText: Sargon Charlie is a precision support weapon. A smart-gel barrel bath sinks heat and keeps shot grouping tight.

Name: Sawtooth Oscillator
FlavorText: Additive synthesis, where A is amplitude and B is bullets in their face.

Name: Song of Ir Yût
FlavorText: It is the song of endings.

Name: Spirit of Alliance
FlavorText: Named by a very optimistic Earthborn Awoken, or his equally oblivious Reefborn counterpart.

Name: SudaZomba-3
FlavorText: Sing along. The rhythm's not hard to catch.

Name: Super Good Advice
FlavorText: This weapon is full of it.

Name: Tamerlane-B
FlavorText: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Tamerlane Bravo is a long-range support weapon with excellent precision for its class.

Name: Tamerlane-C3
FlavorText: The Tamerlane-C3 team support gun boasts a mag-suspended precision barrel and onboard electronics.

Name: Tamerlane-E1
FlavorText: The heavy Echo-1 Tamerlane uses sapphire wiring to integrate tactical systems.

Name: The Culling
FlavorText: A machine gun named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

Name: The Infinite Theorem
FlavorText: In the mirrorlike crags of the Fields of Glass, a single mote of dust produces infinite reflections.

Name: THE SWARM
FlavorText: Hunger is the all of it, and it is all of hunger.

Name: The Unseeing Eye
FlavorText: "It is the blind eye that knows most keenly what it does not see." —Parables of the Allspring

Name: The Variable
FlavorText: A heavy-fire weapon, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

Name: Thunderlord
FlavorText: "They rest quiet on fields afar…for this is no ending, but the eye."

Name: Unending Deluge III
FlavorText: When it rains…

Name: Wolves' Bane
FlavorText: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

Name: Wolves' Bane
FlavorText: During the Hildian Campaign, the Queen had need of weapons that could fire in a vacuum as well as an atmosphere.

Name: Wolves' Curse
FlavorText: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

Name: Xerxes-C
FlavorText: Conquer new worlds with the decisive thunderclap of the Xerxes' heavy rounds.

Name: Xerxes-E
FlavorText: Beneath the loud color scheme is an intricate mechanism utterly devoted to the delivery of brute force.

Name: Xerxes-E1
FlavorText: Echo-1 variant of the popular Xerxes. The weapon's corkscrew heart pumps coolant blood.

Name: Zombie Apocalypse WF47
FlavorText: Ready for one breed of armageddon.

Name: "Atlas's Burden"
FlavorText: "Other ages had the phalanx, the carrier, the KKV. Now you are the defining weapons system of our time."

Name: "Blood and Mortar"
FlavorText: "A distraction? The Crucible challenges our best. It is the finest training the City could ask."

Name: "Cast in Blood"
FlavorText: "The naysayers in Consensus don't understand that we LIKE to fight each other." - Ain Suhu-ässä

Name: "The Mandate"
FlavorText: "We reject this cumbersome doctrine of interdependence. Every solitary Titan must be a standfast against the dark."

Name: "Ultimateless"
FlavorText: Those who bear this mark vow to always test the limits of Light against the Light itself.

Name: Avenger Mark
FlavorText: "I require no miracles. We will reclaim our worlds with systematic, aggressive action against enemy assets. "

Name: Bastion Mark
FlavorText: Field repairs are part of the Titan creed, but the particularly devoted clip spare tools to their mark.

Name: Dead Light Mark
FlavorText: "Beyond the City. Yes, beyond the Traveler." —Arach Jalaal

Name: Deep Stone Crypt
FlavorText: A badge illustrating the infamous subroutine which seeded the first Exo consciousness.

Name: Defender's Mark
FlavorText: At Six Fronts, defending the Wall was not enough. Titans had to become a wall.

Name: Devils' Mark
FlavorText: The battle never ends.

Name: First Pillar Mark
FlavorText: The many strategic victories of the First Pillar Order are not without cost.

Name: Five Mile Mark
FlavorText: Radagast's Host made it five miles from the City's first walls. This pattern commemorates their march.

Name: Formation Mark
FlavorText: Crucible tactics explore the tension between team cohesion and individual bravura.

Name: Freeholder's Memory
FlavorText: The symbol of the great city of Freehold, the lost gem of Mars.

Name: Garuda Mark
FlavorText: Forged in fire and darkness. Lit up like a thousand thousand suns.

Name: Golden Hour Mark
FlavorText: I wear this in service. I earned this by sacrifice.

Name: Heliopause Mark
FlavorText: "Once, deep space explorers were seen as heroes. Now, for suggesting humanity should look beyond this system, some call us cowards." —Arach Parnell

Name: Hesperonaut Mark
FlavorText: Our heritage is not one of war, but of exploration.

Name: Holborn's Host Mark
FlavorText: Genial old Holborn led a group of Guardians on several risky expeditions to Mars.

Name: Honor of Cormorant
FlavorText: One of the remaining sashes of the Cormorant, torn in battle by a forgotten foe.

Name: Immanent War Mark
FlavorText: The subtlest of wars still leave their marks.

Name: Impervious Mark
FlavorText: "It was not a significant bullet."

Name: Infinite Lines Mark
FlavorText: ...pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

Name: Iron Camelot Mark
FlavorText: Forged in remembrance of Radegast, he who was first among the peers of the Iron Banner.

Name: Ithacan Mark
FlavorText: Slow and steady wins the race.

Name: Jolder's Iron Sash
FlavorText: You are an army, an armada, a force unto itself.

Name: Jovian Guard
FlavorText: Choose your words and sigils well, for they are your remembering.

Name: Kallipolis Mark
FlavorText: The leader we need is among us, not above us.

Name: Kell's Mark
FlavorText: Be feared.

Name: Kings' Mark
FlavorText: Take the throne.

Name: Light of the Great Prism
FlavorText: "When the long dark closes around us, we will be the last light." - Wei Ning

Name: Lightning Mark
FlavorText: "The sun low in the sky, the wind in your hair, your enemies piled at your feet. Perfection."

Name: Mark of a Kellslayer
FlavorText: "See this mark and know: by my hands a Kell has fallen."

Name: Mark of Bluster
FlavorText: "The Blustery Brew" is a favorite City tavern amongst Titans.

Name: Mark of Chaos
FlavorText: There is no doubt that our future will be won in battle.

Name: Mark of Command
FlavorText: "A successful defense prolongs a war. A successful attack ends it."

Name: Mark of Contention
FlavorText: The mighty Thalor was invincible in the Crucible - until Dredgen Yor, and his Thorn.

Name: Mark of Desolation
FlavorText: Did that shadow just move?

Name: Mark of Diligence
FlavorText: Titan armor is crafted by legion members, not the City's foundries. Every would-be smith proves themselves on Fieldplate.

Name: Mark of Discipline
FlavorText: Novice Titans are expected to adapt to their new lives with discipline and determination.

Name: Mark of Favor
FlavorText: City communities work together to produce these marks as gifts for their champions.

Name: Mark of Fortitude
FlavorText: Some historians mark the rise of Fieldplate as the moment the Titan orders found their footing.

Name: Mark of Fortune
FlavorText: "I would trust it to thee if it were silver; I would give it even if it were gold." - the Edda

Name: Mark of Fury
FlavorText: "We can wait here until the Traveler falls! Or we can go out there and kill them!" - from a doctrinal dispute

Name: Mark of History
FlavorText: Titan marks are worn to honor the history of individuals or entire orders.

Name: Mark of Jagi's Host
FlavorText: Jagi's Host was last seen marching south of the Cosmodrome, toward the shores of the Caspian Sea.

Name: Mark of Lost Charge
FlavorText: A zealous few sneer at the legend of Six Fronts. Our invincible defense was a waste, they say. We should have charged.

Name: Mark of Mourning
FlavorText: Some Guardians have a hard time relating to the rest of the City. Others know their struggles all too well.

Name: Mark of No Tomorrow
FlavorText: Passion and patience in equal measure will open the unlimited way.

Name: Mark of Oblivion
FlavorText: Our salvation lies ahead of us. Go forth. There is nothing left to leave behind.

Name: Mark of Passage
FlavorText: Within the walls, weary wanderers can find rest.

Name: Mark of Renown
FlavorText: Robust and flexible, the iconic Fieldplate pattern has served every Titan order.

Name: Mark of Resolve
FlavorText: "You cannot control the enemy. You can control yourself. The real victory lies within." - Pujari, Transcript VII

Name: Mark of Sacrifice
FlavorText: Sometimes the mark will tangle in the armor. Shred it without hesitation. It, too, is prepared to sacrifice.

Name: Mark of Thunder
FlavorText: "What is the power of the lightning without the roar of the thunder?" —Wei Ning

Name: Mark of Unity
FlavorText: The Six Fronts, perhaps the most recognizable element used in Titan marks, memorializes a mighty stand.

Name: Mark of Wings
FlavorText: News travels fast in the City.

Name: Mark of the Anchor
FlavorText: Titan orders are often accused of dour fatalism. But there are those who celebrate all they protect.

Name: Mark of the Arena
FlavorText: City dwellers often sport totems and tunics denoting their favorite Crucible combatants and teams.

Name: Mark of the Beacon
FlavorText: "A singer came to me, saying, 'You protect me, and I do nothing in return.' I told him to sing, and he understood." - Saint-14

Name: Mark of the Bulwarks
FlavorText: "War upon stone and it grows weaker. War upon man and he grows stronger. Which shall your wall be built of?"

Name: Mark of the Chain
FlavorText: Even at Six Fronts, the City's darkest hour, some Titans broke orders, but the Chain prevailed.

Name: Mark of the Chosen
FlavorText: "Your Light drives your armor. Do not speak of yourself as separate from the plate." - Pujari, Transcript XV

Name: Mark of the Circle
FlavorText: History's lords have ever painted the future in tones of fire and shadow.

Name: Mark of the Conqueror
FlavorText: "THE LAST AND SUREST ARGUMENT" - traditional inscription for the right gauntlet, attributed to Wei Ning

Name: Mark of the Dauntless
FlavorText: "Yes, we've achieved the objective. And the next. And the…were we supposed to stop attacking?" —Wei Ning

Name: Mark of the Devils
FlavorText: "I seek no worship, only war."

Name: Mark of the Duskborn
FlavorText: "We called her Verok; it was her and her Thrall that finally overwhelmed him." - Eris

Name: Mark of the Embattled
FlavorText: Marks are worn low on the body to avoid interfering with a Titan's arms or weapons. They still see wear.

Name: Mark of the Executor
FlavorText: The New Monarchy is the aegis that guards humanity.

Name: Mark of the Exile
FlavorText: "Though the City won a great battle at Twilight Gap, it lost an even greater mind." —Sister Lupe

Name: Mark of the Exodus
FlavorText: The stars are calling.

Name: Mark of the Far-Flung
FlavorText: Every Guardian's first act is to defend a home they have not yet known.

Name: Mark of the First Pillar
FlavorText: Titans train to fight on dangerous ground, a first line of defense against any crisis.

Name: Mark of the Fortress
FlavorText: Fortresses do not wait silently for war. They are schools, trading posts, monuments. Vessels for life.

Name: Mark of the Gatekeepers
FlavorText: The Pilgrim Guard was the first Titan order, formed to protect refugees entering the fledgling Last City.

Name: Mark of the Hidden
FlavorText: "And with the lone strength of the Titan Vell Tarlowe, we felt invincible." - Eris

Name: Mark of the Initiative
FlavorText: Speak with the voice of the people, or prepare to face them.

Name: Mark of the Keeper
FlavorText: When there is turmoil in the City, cool-headed Titans often help restore the peace. Sometimes it costs them.

Name: Mark of the Kings
FlavorText: "No beast lords over Earth."

Name: Mark of the Lost
FlavorText: Every Titan's individual legend could inspire a new lineage of marks.

Name: Mark of the Lost Seven
FlavorText: One by one, the Ghosts of Jagi's Host returned to the City. If they knew of their Guardians' fates, they would not reveal it.

Name: Mark of the Martyred
FlavorText: It is called the Firebreak Calculus: how much good could I do if I find the right place and fight until I die?

Name: Mark of the New Front
FlavorText: The Firebreak orders strive to draw the battle away from the City and its interests.

Name: Mark of the New Sun
FlavorText: "He loosens all bonds." - the Lokasenna

Name: Mark of the Oasis
FlavorText: A Titan in the field is better than an oasis in the desert.

Name: Mark of the Old Challenge
FlavorText: By their rules must you win, or not at all.

Name: Mark of the Order
FlavorText: The City prospers on our field of order and justice.

Name: Mark of the Pariah
FlavorText: "I wear his symbols proudly in the City, to remind them that Osiris is not truly gone." —Fractal Scrolls

Name: Mark of the Pilgrim Guard
FlavorText: Legend holds that Titans stood in defense of the first pilgrims to gather below the Traveler.

Name: Mark of the Pit
FlavorText: Torn from a vanquished Wizard, it flutters in windless air.

Name: Mark of the Protector
FlavorText: The first Titans led survivors to the safety of the City.

Name: Mark of the Queen's Guard
FlavorText: One throne beneath the howling dark.

Name: Mark of the Risen
FlavorText: A Titan's mark declares deeds and influences. Your Ghost scrounged this cloth together. It's a start.

Name: Mark of the Rising
FlavorText: What rules us is our service to the greater welfare of the City.

Name: Mark of the Sentry
FlavorText: The City's enemies often use airmobile tactics. Some Titans train for rapid response to these landings.

Name: Mark of the Six Fronts
FlavorText: Four orders of Titans held six approaches in the first great battle around the Last City, and not one front broke.

Name: Mark of the Sojourn
FlavorText: Our will is such that we find strength in the gaze of Death itself.

Name: Mark of the Sortie
FlavorText: At Six Fronts, two Firebreak commanders led a sortie beyond the walls. They reclaimed five miles of scorched land from the Fallen.

Name: Mark of the Spawn
FlavorText: "It's not an Acolyte's loin cloth, it's the spoils of war." - Vell Tarlowe

Name: Mark of the Stoneborn
FlavorText: "They don't fail." - Commander Zavala, in an emergency session of the City Consensus

Name: Mark of the Sunforged
FlavorText: "Of all the Lights, we burned the brightest." —Unknown Sunbreaker

Name: Mark of the Supreme
FlavorText: Titan lore memorializes the greatest warriors of humanity's past.

Name: Mark of the Undying Mind
FlavorText: The Black Garden grows in both directions.

Name: Mark of the Wall
FlavorText: "We have one city. One final chance. There are no forgivable errors. Be ceaseless in your vigilance."

Name: Mark of the War Tides
FlavorText: "At the doom of Men he will return home among the wise Vanir." - the Edda

Name: Mark of the Watcher
FlavorText: "The mark's just pretty cloth. What matters is what it stands for." - Pujari, Transcript IX

Name: Mark of the Witness
FlavorText: "Fighting your enemy helps you understand your enemy. Don't get distracted." —Zavala

Name: Mark of the Wolves
FlavorText: "I am the leader of the pack."

Name: Moctezuma-Polyphonic
FlavorText: A mark of unity which celebrates the equality of all under the protection of the Traveler.

Name: NOYB Mark
FlavorText: "One day in the Crucible tells you everything you need to know about a Guardian. Even yourself." - Thalor

Name: Old Man's Mark
FlavorText: "Sometimes, I wish my Ghost had picked someone else."

Name: Order of the Lost Saint
FlavorText: "His Light cast no shadows."- Paean to Saint-14

Name: Pandion Mark
FlavorText: “Glory in the Crucible—that is the truest immortality a Guardian can attain.” —Thalor

Name: Pioneer Mark
FlavorText: These marks recall the flags that waved over the first Venus colonies.

Name: Racer's Mark
FlavorText: Your enemies will see the signs of your approach. They will not be able to stop you.

Name: Radegast's Iron Sash
FlavorText: Stand in the fire until there is nothing left to burn away.

Name: Season of Ages XII
FlavorText: A warbanner marking the twelfth era of the Titan orders.

Name: Silimar's Iron Sash
FlavorText: Ward or fist, you cannot be broken.

Name: Spektar Heliopause Mark
FlavorText: If only Darkness lies beyond the heliopause, we have already lost.

Name: Spektar Infinite Mark
FlavorText: …pulled the subject from the Device he appeared frozen. No vitals, but the body hasn't rotted either. —RECORD 340-CHASM-NULL

Name: Spektar Kallipolis Mark
FlavorText: Not the past, not the future. The present is where we should turn our eyes.

Name: Spektar Pandion Mark
FlavorText: "Glory in the Crucible—that is the truest immortality a Guardian can attain." —Thalor

Name: Spektar's Mark
FlavorText: The heat shimmers off the shield, refracting into broken rainbows.

Name: Spirit of Saturn
FlavorText: A ceremonial badge worn by Titans in memory of the lost First Fleet.

Name: Striker's Mark
FlavorText: "It's what we do. It's as natural as breathing." —Holborn

Name: Sublime Light Mark
FlavorText: A trial by fire, the purpose of which is transformation.

Name: Sunbreaker's Mark
FlavorText: Once, these marks streamed proudly from the City's rooftops. Now, they are a symbol of defiance.

Name: Tarlowe Mark
FlavorText: "The stalwart heart of the team. May his Light find its rest." —Eris Morn

Name: Thalor's Golden Maul
FlavorText: The legendary mark of Thalor, a victor in the Crucible.

Name: War Numen's Mark
FlavorText: Will you barter your soul in exchange for the chance to kill a king?

Name: Wolfswood Mark
FlavorText: And beneath its branches, the Iron Wolves forged an unbreakable oath.

Name: Year 1993
FlavorText: A pattern made famous by the restoration of ancient Golden Age tomes.

Name: Atheon Mask
FlavorText: "It's about time!" —Fenchurch Everis

Name: Crota Mask
FlavorText: "Don this monster's face to hide the monsters lurking behind your own." —Fenchurch Everis

Name: Cryptarch Mask
FlavorText: "I myself frequently don the guise of my old friend Rahool in order to enter the Tower unremarked." —Fenchurch Everis

Name: Eris Morn Mask
FlavorText: There's something very disturbing about this mask.

Name: Exotic Engram Mask
FlavorText: "That's an 'exotic' look, Guardian." —Tess Everis

Name: Legendary Engram Mask
FlavorText: "Yes, it's true—the Legendary Engram was named after me." —Fenchurch Everis

Name: Oryx Mask
FlavorText: I am the Taken King!

Name: Petra Venj Mask
FlavorText: The Queen's Wrath is beautiful and terrible to behold.

Name: Rare Engram Mask
FlavorText: "To be a Guardian is to be part of a rarefied company of heroes." —Fenchurch Everis

Name: Skolas Mask
FlavorText: The Kell of Kells.

Name: Skull Mask
FlavorText: Festival of the Lost 2015 You have risen from eternal night to haunt the dreams of your enemies.

Name: Speaker Mask
FlavorText: "In my travels I have learned that speaking is much easier than listening." —Fenchurch Everis

Name: Tiger Mask
FlavorText: "In the Vex's time conflux I befriended a being with this striking visage. He was noble, brave, and bestial." —Fenchurch Everis

Name: Traveler Mask
FlavorText: "Such simplicity. Such contours! Been inside the Traveler, you know. Smells faintly of vanilla." —Fenchurch Everis

Name: Uncommon Engram Mask
FlavorText: "I see that you and I have 'common' interests, Guardian." —Fenchurch Everis

Name: Warden Mask
FlavorText: "You mock me, Guardian?" —Variks

Name: Xûr Mask
FlavorText: "Even with all my lengthy travels, my knowledge has limits. Ah, do keep that quiet." —Fenchurch Everis

Name: 123 Syzygy
FlavorText: All in a row.

Name: 55A-allFATE
FlavorText: To each a purpose, and to all a fitting end.

Name: Aegis of the Kell
FlavorText: For this judgment, there is no protection.

Name: Aegis of the Kell II
FlavorText: For this judgment, there is no protection.

Name: Aegis of the Reef
FlavorText: Protect the borders. Punish the unjust.

Name: Anomie MSm
FlavorText: Is lawlessness the natural state of the universe?

Name: Antapex MSc
FlavorText: Which reality, but for the one we enact upon ourselves and others?

Name: Apple of Discord
FlavorText: "For the fairest."

Name: Bad Juju
FlavorText: "If you believe your weapon wants to end all existence, then so it will." - Toland the Shattered

Name: Bad Seed Down
FlavorText: A manufacturing defect cracked the frame and fused its systems – and somehow made it deadlier.

Name: Baryon MSc
FlavorText: Microbays for tactical systems enhance an already potent precision pulse rifle.

Name: Black SUROS SWB-42
FlavorText: A lightweight and snappy Suros pulse rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

Name: Catena MSc
FlavorText: A light, responsive weapon with attachment points for unorthodox systems modules.

Name: Coiled Hiss
FlavorText: Watch your step.

Name: Cold Current
FlavorText: "There's something dark out beyond the Reef. I can feel it in the void…"

Name: Corona MSc
FlavorText: Light the path. And when all else fails... aim for the head.

Name: CRACKERJACK.BETA
FlavorText: Not liable for damage or disability caused by prototype performance.

Name: Dead Air 09F3
FlavorText: The recoil-cushioning cytogel, left to grow, has fused into a primitive neural network.

Name: Echo 33
FlavorText: "Negative. We will hold until overrun. Echo 3-3, signing off."

Name: Evergreen II.I
FlavorText: Hope springs eternal.

Name: Fair and Square
FlavorText: A formidable burst-fire, precision rifle, custom-rigged for Crucible combat. Scrupulously devoted to fair play.

Name: Final Duty
FlavorText: Created for Paladin Hallam Fen in honor of his efforts at the fortress on Cybele.

Name: Grasp of Malok
FlavorText: "Dutiful Malok. Many offerings of Light did he make at the Shrines of Oryx." —Eris Morn

Name: Häkke Test-A
FlavorText: Häkke prototype. Make precision shots with this weapon to gather data for Häkke's armament scientists.

Name: Harrowed Smite of Merain
FlavorText: "No tomb but the battlefield! No legacy but the scars we etch upon our foes!"

Name: Hawksaw
FlavorText: A northwesterly wind is blowing.

Name: Herja-D
FlavorText: Devastate your foes with the deadly precision of the Häkke Herja-D.

Name: Hopscotch Pilgrim
FlavorText: It's a long road. Enjoy it.

Name: Hotspur-A
FlavorText: Piezopolymer paneling makes the Häkke Hotspur-A a balanced war machine.

Name: Hydrus
FlavorText: A Guardian relic named for the water snake of the night sky.

Name: KAU8 Constellation Scar
FlavorText: Constellations are an artifact of perspective.

Name: Lump Distribution
FlavorText: This nimble rifle's on-board tactical systems keep a scrupulous tally of combat stats.

Name: Lyudmila-D
FlavorText: The cold sharpshooter's precision of the Häkke Lyudmila-D is a marvel to behold.

Name: Moriaen-D
FlavorText: You are a child of many cultures, a protector of all peoples.

Name: New Heart LDD
FlavorText: Clear!

Name: Nirwen's Mercy
FlavorText: A burst-fire weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

Name: No Time To Explain
FlavorText: A single word is etched onto the inside of the weapon's casing: "Soon."

Name: Occulate MSc
FlavorText: Where does the cloaking Darkness end?

Name: Oversoul Edict
FlavorText: The light of the will of Crota shines down like a vast and inverse sun.

Name: Painted Apollo MSc
FlavorText: A highly accurate Nadir firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

Name: Painted Neptune MSc
FlavorText: A high-velocity Nadir firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

Name: Painted SUROS BZL-45
FlavorText: A precision Suros pulse rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

Name: Payment VI
FlavorText: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

Name: Payment VI
FlavorText: Paladin Hallam Fen commissioned this weapon in memory of his mentor, Paladin Imogen Rife.

Name: Praedyth's Timepiece
FlavorText: "He skipped like a stone on time's ocean. This is what's left." - Unknown

Name: Primed Starfall MSc
FlavorText: A tactically flexible Nadir pulse rifle, earned through glory in the Crucible.

Name: Psi Alba IV
FlavorText: This power has always existed. Only our understanding is new.

Name: Psi Alto III
FlavorText: This weapon's power comes from the strength of its wielder's will.

Name: Psi Lento III
FlavorText: The journey to enlightenment is slow, but rewarding.

Name: Psi Tempus II
FlavorText: Pulse rifles fire in short, sharp bursts. This Psi Tempus variant is a flexible multirole design.

Name: Psi Tempus III
FlavorText: Multirole weapon. Fire control system can double as an NLS drive regulator, if you don't mind a gun flying your ship.

Name: Psi Umbra I

Name: Häkke Test-A
FlavorText: Häkke prototype. Use against Cabal Centurions to gather data for Häkke's armament scientists.

Name: Harrowed Defiance of Yasmin
FlavorText: "Shields up! Protect the Queen! Brace for impact! Save the Queen—" —Paladin Yasmin Eld

Name: Hieracon-LR5

FlavorText: Please replace these components if use causes fatal damage: HEAT SINK. MAGAZINE. OPERATOR

Name: LDR 5001

Name: Low-Grade Humility
FlavorText: "I'm good at this."

Name: Luna Chiral III

Name: Neutrino LSm

Name: Pompeii-LR3
FlavorText: An accurized sniper rifle named for the site of an ancient disaster.

Name: Pompeii-LR5

Name: Praedyth's Revenge

Name: Prudence II

Name: Saigon-LR5

Name: Scipio-E

Name: Shadow of Veils

Name: Silvered Boudicca-D

Name: Silvered Mulan-D
FlavorText: A highly accurate Häkke firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

Name: SUROS JLL-19

Name: Tamar-D
FlavorText: With the Häkke Tamar-D, they'll never see you coming.

FlavorText: A sharpshooter's weapon named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

FlavorText: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

Name: Tomyris-E2

Name: Violator XII

Name: Y-09 Longbow Synthesis

Name: EV-31 Nightbird

Name: EV-32 Snowblind

Name: EV-33 Dragonrider
FlavorText: At some point, it will come down to how tightly you can hold on.

Name: EV-43 Lightrunner

Name: S-20 Cavalier
FlavorText: The Series-20 Cavalier is a Titan mainstay, more robust and reliable than the baseline Sparrow.

Name: S-20 Nomad
FlavorText: Hunters have a reputation for technical savvy. The S-20 Nomad highlights that expertise.

Name: S-20 Seeker
FlavorText: Warlocks devised the Series-20 Seeker variant of the Sparrow for their own arcane purposes.

Name: S-21 Cavalier
FlavorText: Titans tune their thrust bikes to handle the burden of heavy armor.

Name: S-21 Nomad
FlavorText: On foot or by thrust bike, Hunters carve new trails through the frontier.

Name: S-21 Seeker
FlavorText: Careful attention to the Seeker's shielding reduces field interference.

Name: S-22 Cavalier
FlavorText: The Series-22 Cavalier helps put Titans right where they belong--in the thick of the battle.

Name: S-22 Nomad
FlavorText: The Series-22 Nomad helps Hunters stalk swift prey.

Name: S-22 Seeker
FlavorText: The Series-22 Seeker answers the esoteric needs of elite Warlocks.

Name: S-30C (Emerald)
FlavorText: This S-30C's strange drive leaves an unusual green trail.

Name: S-30C (Plasma)
FlavorText: This S-30C's custom plasma drive presents a compelling argument for speed over safety.

Name: S-30C (Stealth)
FlavorText: This S-30C's stealth drive filters out most high frequency emissions.

Name: S-30C (Void)
FlavorText: This S-30C's prototype drive is tinted purple by exotic void reactions.

Name: S-30C Phoenix
FlavorText: The coveted S-30C Phoenix is reserved for Guardians who demonstrate exceptional resolve.

Name: S-30V
FlavorText: The Vanguard reserves the Series-30 Sparrow for the most successful Guardians.

Name: S-32V

Name: S-34 Ravensteel
FlavorText: The Sparrow is your pen, speed your ink, the open road your blank page. You are a poet of motion.

Name: S-35 Aeon Glow
FlavorText: Turn on the lights.

Name: SR-0 Swiftriver
FlavorText: Don't fight it. Flow with it.

Name: SR-1 Swiftriver
FlavorText: Upgraded field engine makes the Swiftriver more nimble than ever.

Name: SV7 "War Runner"
FlavorText: A high-end Sparrow earned by those Guardians who prove their worth in the Trials of Osiris.

Name: Velumbra
FlavorText: "I face the challenges to come with dry eyes. There will be a time to mourn, but not until we have our vengeance." —Petra Venj

Name: XV0 "Timebreaker"
FlavorText: Many are brave, but only the strong and the living will ever ride this Sparrow.

Name: Arc Edge
FlavorText: The dark heart of Willbreaker burns within this blade.

Name: Arc Infinite Edge
FlavorText: There are few companions truer than a well-honed weapon. Treasure it.

Name: Bolt-Caster
FlavorText: With your own hands you forged the mighty Bolt-Caster. Now take it in hand and unleash its thunder.

Name: Dark-Drinker
FlavorText: With your own hands you forged the mighty Dark-Drinker. Now take it in hand and slake its thirst.

Name: Dreadfang
FlavorText: Kingly brother, I thank you for the gift of your failure. The sword logic demands a pinnacle.

Name: Raze-Lighter
FlavorText: With your own hands you forged the mighty Raze-Lighter. Now take it in hand and feed its flames.

Name: Sol Edge
FlavorText: This reforged shard of Willbreaker wavers on the edge of Light and Dark.

Name: Sol Infinite Edge
FlavorText: Two blades are better than one.

Name: Void Edge
FlavorText: The Hadium metal of what was once Willbreaker courses with conflicting energies.

Name: Void Infinite Edge
FlavorText: As unbreakable as the bond between comrades in arms.
